WorkItem.ClosedComment: WPP have been updated to detect the very latest version of the console
WorkItem.Description:
I am getting this error message after doing WPP install on an administrative computer. 
WSUS Server version: 3.2.7600.226
Server OS 2003
Administrative workstation version: 3.2.7600.226
Workstation OS Windows 7
The Hotfix mention in a thread doesn't apply for a Server with an OS of 2003. 
All settings seem to be in order, I can pull all my units up in the WPP console.
WorkItem.Summary: Server Version different from console version

Comments.Message:
Open WPP, connect to the server, then go to Help->About
Tell me what is wrote aside of "Server Version" and "Console Version".

Your WSUS-Version is very old. Pls install all Updates on your WSUS *and* on your Windows Client with installed WSUS-Console:

WSUS 3.0 (SP2): 	Build 3.2.7600.226
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2720211: 	Build 3.2.7600.251
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2734608: 	Build 3.2.7600.256
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2828185: 	Build 3.2.7600.262
WSUS 3.0 (SP2) + KB2938066: 	Build 3.2.7600.274


Here you find the exact Version:
http://www.wsus.de/images/wsus-version.png
